      • isSamMatching

        public boolean isSamMatching(SamIdentifier samIdentifier)
        Indicates whether the SamResource matches the provided SAM identifier.

        The test includes the SamRevision, serial number and group reference provided by the SamIdentifier.

        The SAM serial number can be null or empty, in this case all serial numbers are accepted. It can also be a regular expression target one or more specific serial numbers.

        The groupe reference can be null or empty to let all group references match but not empty the group reference must match the SamIdentifier to have the method returning true.

        Parameters:
        samIdentifier - the SAM identifier
        Returns:
        true or false according to the result of the correspondence test

      • setSamResourceStatus

        public void setSamResourceStatus(SamResource.SamResourceStatus samResourceStatus)
        Sets the free/busy status of the SamResource
        Parameters:
        samResourceStatus - FREE/BUSY enum value
